Description: This manuscript contains information on all of the requirements of the Islamic faith (Jami'ul arkan) and deals with mysticism. It is divided into different texts: The creed of faith concerning the 20 characteristics of God, written by Ahmad Marzuki bin alm; Sajid Sharif's explanation of the book entitled an-Niqayah (about the pillars of religion and Sufism); the treatise of Ruslan of Damascus, a commentary of Abu Yahya Zakariya Al-Anshary under the title: Fathurahman about monotheism; Treatise of Sheikh Abdul Karim ibn Ibrahim al Jili about the perfect man (al Insan al Kamil); the treatise of the creed of Ahlus Sunnah wal Jamaah; and the News of the ascendancy of the Prophet. Extent and format of original material: 1 manuscript written on European paper. 335mm x 195mm. It is told there is a problem in the story in 1000 about Samud Abdullah bin Salam. Original story was written in the language of Persian. It was translated into the Jawi language by the copyist. Beginning with the story of Abbas after visiting the Prophet in Medina, came the angel Gabriel to tell the command to bring / send a letter to a pious Jew in the place named Khaibar and the jew pastor was Abdullah ibnu Salam who was very well learned man about the Torah, the Gospel, and Psalms. The letter was delivered by a qadi named. The letter is as follow: "Bismillahirrahmanirrahim, (In the name of God the most Merciful) I'm the last prophet, ... fainnal Ardha yarisuha man yasya'min man 'ibadih wal' aqibatu lilmuttaqiin ..." (the earth will be inherited to those being selected by God from his servants and the end of the events are for the pious people). Extent and format of original material: European paper. Page Title: Hillul Rumuz wa Mafatihul Kunuz (Fly kawruh kabatinan No.2)
Description: Front: Prayer from the fragment of the Qur'anic verses, sura: Al-Baqarah and al Maidah; The Prayer of basmalah Kafi, Wafi, ma'afi etc.; Remembrance of Allah, Muhammad ibn Abdullah and "So and so Allahummaj'al muhammad kama u'iltu muhibbat bin Yusuf, Muhammad bin fulan fi qalbi Zulaikha, etc. (Prayer for the couples which is different from the hadith); Poem of seclusion: He is the One who begins without the beginning. (huwaawinalul mubdi bighairil bidayah), etc. Rear: Achievement of noblest grade and the meaning of there is no God but Allah. Everything will perish but Him; Science and charities. There are two kinds of knowledge: the first oral knowledge that is the argument of God for mankind, and the second is the knowledge of heart, the knowledge of no fearing but God; Knowledge about the way to approach God to achieve the positions of kings. The first is Islam as the early stage of religion, for common believers, that is to perform religious duty, and the second is Iman or the the stage of heart for the special Muslim, to perform religious duty based on outer and inner aspect (heart), Ihsan or being good the stage of spirit for those who try to approach God that is to perform all the obligation by outer and inner aspect in order to show the greatness of God; Repentance is the nature of the common believers, Inabah is the nature of the selected ones and aubah is the nature of the prophets; Haudhal of Life (the Book of Indies) in the council by Muh. Assamarkandi: about the question of who is worthy of being worshiped? God. About the spirit? The Prophet said: Allah affairs; The way of worlds, man, great world and part of the world; Knowing the soul: in the small world from harroh Azizah; 25 blank pages from the end of the day. This is the end of the book entitled Hillul Rumuz by Imam al Arabi, the pole of the saint man Abdillah Muhammad al Maghribi Muhyiddin Arabi. Extent and format of original material: Daluwang paper.
